org.midao.jdbc.core

Class MidaoFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.midao.jdbc.core.MidaoFactory
  • Deprecated.

    @Deprecated
public class MidaoFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    Midao Factory is responsible for creating core classes instances

    This class is Deprecated - please use MjdbcFactory instead
